00016 #ifndef BT_MULTIBODY_SOLVER_CONSTRAINT_H
00017 #define BT_MULTIBODY_SOLVER_CONSTRAINT_H
00018 
00019 #include "LinearMath/btVector3.h"
00020 #include "LinearMath/btAlignedObjectArray.h"
00021 
00022 class btMultiBody;
00023 class btMultiBodyConstraint;
00024 #include "BulletDynamics/ConstraintSolver/btSolverBody.h"
00025 #include "BulletDynamics/ConstraintSolver/btContactSolverInfo.h"
00026 
00028 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16 (struct)    btMultiBodySolverConstraint
00029 {
00030         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00031 
00032         btMultiBodySolverConstraint() : m_solverBodyIdA(-1), m_multiBodyA(0), m_linkA(-1), m_solverBodyIdB(-1), m_multiBodyB(0), m_linkB(-1),m_orgConstraint(0), m_orgDofIndex(-1)
00033         {}
00034 
00035         int                             m_deltaVelAindex;//more generic version of m_relpos1CrossNormal/m_contactNormal1
00036         int                             m_jacAindex;
00037         int                             m_deltaVelBindex;
00038         int                             m_jacBindex;
00039 
00040         btVector3               m_relpos1CrossNormal;
00041         btVector3               m_contactNormal1;       
00042         btVector3               m_relpos2CrossNormal;
00043         btVector3               m_contactNormal2; //usually m_contactNormal2 == -m_contactNormal1, but not always
00044         
00045 
00046         btVector3               m_angularComponentA;
00047         btVector3               m_angularComponentB;
00048         
00049         mutable btSimdScalar    m_appliedPushImpulse;
00050         mutable btSimdScalar    m_appliedImpulse;
00051 
00052         btScalar        m_friction;
00053         btScalar        m_jacDiagABInv;
00054         btScalar                m_rhs;
00055         btScalar                m_cfm;
00056         
00057     btScalar            m_lowerLimit;
00058         btScalar                m_upperLimit;
00059         btScalar                m_rhsPenetration;
00060     union
00061         {
00062                 void*           m_originalContactPoint;
00063                 btScalar        m_unusedPadding4;
00064         };
00065 
00066         int     m_overrideNumSolverIterations;
00067     int                 m_frictionIndex;
00068 
00069         int m_solverBodyIdA;
00070         btMultiBody* m_multiBodyA;
00071         int                     m_linkA;
00072         
00073         int m_solverBodyIdB;
00074         btMultiBody* m_multiBodyB;
00075         int                     m_linkB;
00076 
00077         //for writing back applied impulses
00078         btMultiBodyConstraint*  m_orgConstraint;
00079         int m_orgDofIndex;
00080 
00081         enum            btSolverConstraintType
00082         {
00083                 BT_SOLVER_CONTACT_1D = 0,
00084                 BT_SOLVER_FRICTION_1D
00085         };
00086 };
00087 
00088 typedef btAlignedObjectArray<btMultiBodySolverConstraint>       btMultiBodyConstraintArray;
